Class CheckeredPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.graphics.paints.CheckeredPaint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Transparency
    public class CheckeredPaint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.Paint
    Paints shapes with a pattern of checkered boxes in two colours.
    Since:
    3.00
    Author:
    Chris Jennings
